greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Values of n for which exp(Pi*sqrt(n)) is very close to an integer.
comment: Very close is defined here as being less than 1/100.
e^(Pi*sqrt(163)) is 262537412640768743.9999999999992500725971981856888... and no closer exponent of this character has been discovered. See A069014.
program: /* Adjusting the p-value allows one to select more interesting subsequences. */
results.author: Roy Williams Clickery (roy(AT)ccsf.caltech.edu)
ext: Edited and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 07 2003
